preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 16.4 g of Barium Oxide using an analytical balance. 
 2. Weigh 12.3 g of Copper(II) Phosphate. 
 3. Weigh 4.0 g of Tungsten Oxide. 
 4. Combine all ingredients in a clean ceramic mortar. 
 5. Use a pestle to thoroughly mix the powders until a homogeneous mixture is achieved.
